responsibilities: Develop next-gen AI-enabled PaaS platform, including AI Tooling, Application Platform, and Application Integration Services.
Collaborate closely with a team of experts, including AI researchers and PaaS engineers, to integrate advanced AI features into existing solutions.
Analyze, investigate, and implement Gen AI solutions for Cloud Service features and technologies focusing on Agentic Orchestration and Agent Builder frameworks.
qualifications: Proficiency in Python, Java, and SQL.
Strong foundation in algorithms, data structure, and object-oriented programming.
Solid understanding of Deep Learning principles, especially in NLP.
Hands-on experience with ANNs (e.g., RNN, LSTM, GRU) and deep learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch).
Expertise in advanced Generative AI tools and concepts including Transformers, LLM, Fine-tuning, (Graph) RAG, and Vector Databases.
Solid understanding of AI agents, Agentic Orchestration, AI Agent Workflow Automation, and Agent Builder frameworks such as Lang Chain.
Attention to detail and ability to multi-task under pressure and changing priorities.
analysis: The job responsibilities and skills clearly indicate involvement with Generative AI (GenAI) and language models (LLMs). The responsibilities mention developing AI-enabled platforms and integrating advanced AI features, specifically focusing on Gen AI solutions. The skills section explicitly lists "Strong knowledge of AI LLM" and "Expertise in advanced Generative AI tools and concepts including Transformers, LLM, Fine-tuning, (Graph) RAG, and Vector Databases." Additionally, there is a focus on AI agents and frameworks like Lang Chain, which are relevant to GenAI and LLMs. The mention of deep learning principles, especially in NLP, further supports the involvement with language models.
